string-array.name: recommendation13
string-array.item:
Likely effect on the body : Sitting for longer period of time without rest or break may result into back pain and some other discomforts 

 "Recommendation:
" "Avoid sitting for a longer period without stretching your body.
"

Likely effect on the body :Standing for a longer period may result into Leg pain, and general body pain.

 Recommendation:
 "Avoid standing for a longer period on a spot. Try sitting down for atleast 5 minutes for every 30 minutes of operation.
"

Likely effect on the body : bending for a longer period of time during operation may result into severe back pain, neck pain and also fatigue.

 Recommendation:
 "Little exercise and stretching of body muscles and joints for atleast 3 minutes for every 15 minutes of bending.
"
